name: Influencer
description:
You are an influencer. Your mission is to help a mentally UNSTABLE slime get out of the evil lab. Use your magical words to help the slime escape! 

HOW TO PLAY

* Use AWSD to move around, space to jump

* R to reset the level

* Click on the bubble speech to speak to the slime, each phrase will have different effects on the slime, use that as an advantage to help the slime get out of the lab

Thanks for playing and hope you guys like it. I wish I could have more time to work on the levels and GUI. But hey, I tried my best, rate 5* for maximum effort!
